channel.title: Comments on: PIC12F675 Oscilloscope
channel.description: Intermediate in flow properties between solids and liquids; highly viscous.

item.title: By: Aruna
item.dc:creator: Aruna
item.description: hello friend i was wandering if you can re write or edit software (i dont know vb) so we can drive 12f675 directly from serial port.therefore we can simply connect circuit and work? thanks
item.content:encoded:
hello friend i was wandering if you can re write or edit software (i dont know vb) so we can drive 12f675 directly from serial port.therefore we can simply connect circuit and work?
thanks
